line.issue: Since api-platform/graphql 4.2: The "ApiPlatform\GraphQl\Type\TypeBuilder::isCollection()" method is deprecated, use "ApiPlatform\GraphQl\Type\TypeBuilder::isObjectCollection()" instead.
Since api-platform/graphql 4.2: The "ApiPlatform\GraphQl\Type\TypeConverter::convertType()" method is deprecated, use "ApiPlatform\GraphQl\Type\TypeConverter::convertPhpType()" instead.
